titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the executive branch, in exercising authorities to restrict exports, use a standard definition of those goods which may be exported as humanitarian donations.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 2/23/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that, in exercising certain authorities to restrict exports, the executive branch should use a standard (and broad) definition of humanitarian donations.
